comment: Jetzt hackt's endgltig aus. Zustzlich zum Einsatz von schwer geschtzten Gefechtsfahrzeugen, fernsteuerbaren Waffenstationen, Maschinengewehren, Sturmgewehren und Granaten wird die deutsche Polizei, hier die Landespolizei NRW, zuknftig standardmig ballistische Gefechtshelme in ihren Einsatzfahrzeugen mitfhren. Der Hoplit F1100H soll Vollmantelgeschosse mit Flssigkern vom Kaliber x39 (Kalaschnikow) aufhalten und zugleich den Trger vor einem tdlichen Trauma bewahren knnen. So langsam sind wir an dem Punkt angelangt, in welchem die Polizeikrfte zumindest infanteristisch schlagkrftiger als die Streitkrfte ausgerstet sind. Krank, nur noch krank.
amr:
# ::snt Jetzt hackt's endgltig aus. Zustzlich zum Einsatz von schwer geschtzten Gefechtsfahrzeugen, fernsteuerbaren Waffenstationen, Maschinengewehren, Sturmgewehren und Granaten wird die deutsche Polizei, hier die Landespolizei NRW, zuknftig standardmig ballistische Gefechtshelme in ihren Einsatzfahrzeugen mitfhren. Der Hoplit F1100H soll Vollmantelgeschosse mit Flssigkern vom Kaliber x39 (Kalaschnikow) aufhalten und zugleich den Trger vor einem tdlichen Trauma bewahren knnen. So langsam sind wir an dem Punkt angelangt, in welchem die Polizeikrfte zumindest infanteristisch schlagkrftiger als die Streitkrfte ausgerstet sind. Krank, nur noch krank.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-mod-91
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Jetzt"))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o / organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "National"
                                    :op2 "Defence"
                                    :op3 "League"))
                        :ARG2 (m2 / member)))
            :ARG1-of (h3 / have-mod-91
                  :ARG2 (s / string-entity
                        :value "endgltig")))
      :snt2 (h4 / have-mod-91
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h5 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Society"
                                    :op2 "of"
                                    :op3 "German"
                                    :op4 "Defence"
                                    :op5 "League"))))
            :ARG2 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h6 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o3 / organization
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "National"
                                    :op2 "Defence"
                                    :op3 "League"))
                        :ARG2 (m3 / member)))
            :ARG1-of (h7 / have-mod-91
                  :ARG2 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h8 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (o4 / organization
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "National"
                                          :op2 "Defence"
                                          :op3 "League")))))
            :ARG1-of (h9 / have-mod-91
                  :ARG2 (p6 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h10 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 o4
                              :ARG2 (m4 / member)))
                  :ARG1-of (h11 / have-mod-91
                        :ARG2 (p7 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h12 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (o5 / organization
                                          :name (n6 / name
                                                :op1 "National"
                                                :op2 "Defence"
                                                :op3 "League"))))
                        :ARG1-of (h13 / have-mod-91
                              :ARG2 (m5 / member)))))
      :ARG1-of (h14 / have-mod-91
            :ARG2 (w / wage
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (p8 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h15 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 o3
                              :ARG2 (m6 / member)))
                  :ARG0-of (h16 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p9 / political-party
                              :name (n7 / name
                                    :op1 "Labour"
                                    :op2 "Party"
                                    :op3 "Party")))))
      :ARG1-of h14
      :ARG2 w
      :polarity -
      :ARG0 p8
      :ARG1 w
      :ARG0 p8
      :ARG1-of (h17 / have-mod-91
            :ARG0 p8
            :ARG1 w
            :ARG2 w)
      :ARG1-of h14
      :ARG0 p8
      :ARG1 w
      :ARG1-of (h18 / have-mod-91
            :ARG0 p8
            :ARG0 p8))

comment: You might consider traveling to Auschwitz yourself. That way you'll have some actual evidence for your hoax theory.
amr:
# ::snt You might consider traveling to Auschwitz yourself. That way you'll have some actual evidence for your hoax theory.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (c / consider-02
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / travel-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG4 (f / facility
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Auschwitz")))))
      :snt2 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (e / evidence-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / theory
                        :topic (h2 / hoax-01
                              :ARG0 y2))
                  :ARG1-of (a / actual-02)
                  :quant (s / some))
            :manner (w / way
                  :mod (t3 / that))))

comment: I find that the more frequently people hide behind slurs and cries of conspiracy theories, the less they actually know about a subject.
amr:
# ::snt I find that the more frequently people hide behind slurs and cries of conspiracy theories, the less they actually know about a subject.
(f / find-02
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (c / correlate-91
            :ARG1 (m / more
                  :ARG3-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 (h2 / hide-01
                              :ARG0 (p / person)
                              :ARG1 (b / behind
                                    :op1 (a / and
                                          :op1 (s / slur)
                                          :op2 (c2 / cry-01
                                                :ARG1 (t / theory
                                                      :topic (c3 / conspire-01)))))
                              :ARG1-of (f2 / frequent-02))))
            :ARG2 (l / less
                  :ARG3-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 (k / know-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (s2 / subject)
                              :ARG1-of (a2 / actual-02))
                        :ARG2 (m2 / much)))))

comment: instead of falsely claiming that the holocaust was a hoax, buy a plane ticket and travel to Yad Vashem in Israel
amr:
# ::snt instead of falsely claiming that the holocaust was a hoax, buy a plane ticket and travel to Yad Vashem in Israel
(ii / instead-of-91
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (b / buy-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / ticket
                        :mod (p / plane)))
            :op2 (t2 / travel-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG4 (c / city
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Yad"
                              :op2 "Vashem")
                        :location (c2 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Israel")))))
      :ARG2 (c3 / claim-01
            :ARG1 (h / hoax-01
                  :ARG2 (h2 / holocaust))
            :manner (f / false)))
